Trade/Device Name(s): Lin-Zhi International, Inc. (LZI) Methamphetamine Enzyme Immunoassay for Pictus Analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Methamphetamine Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative detection of d-methamphetamine in urine using Pictus Analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of d-methamphetamine in human urine at a cutoff value of 500 ng/mL as a rapid screening procedure; results are preliminary and require confirmation by GC/MS or LC/MS.
